sub section 1.1: In Q4 2021, SSNLF reported record quarterly revenue of approximately KRW 80 trillion, which reflects significant year-over-year growth driven by robust demand in the semiconductor and mobile sectors. Compared to guidance from Q3 2021, revenue exceeded expectations due to strong sales in premium products, despite challenges such as declining memory prices and increased selling, general and administrative expenses (SG&A), which rose to KRW 17.8 trillion. The overall market demand and seasonal factors contributed to this performance.
